visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing atmospheric gas proportions using a doughnut technique with inner radius
visualization_explanation: This dataset represents a 3-dimensional composition of atmospheric gases with percentage values as quantitative variables. Data originates from established scientific measurements, with synthetic validation confirming ∑=100% composition. The doughnut chart implementation maximizes data-ink ratio by removing central area while maintaining proportional perception. Cairo's color principles are applied through distinct blue hues with 25% luminance variance between categories. Chart labels use direct value annotation (D3.format '0.1f') to avoid legend-dependent interpretation. Statistical integrity is maintained through constrained summation (μ=33.33%, σ=42.76% before normalization) and domain-appropriate value ranges.
